name: Out of Reach (itch) (Otton Drumm)
description:
"I want to say i knew it was gonna happen but I can't... i really can't."

"...there is always next time"

"There won't be one, I'm sorry..."

Out of Reach is a game about an impossible journey through memories and sorrow, with a bit of nostalgy.

The story will develop within 3 main chapters, exploring relationships and bonds.

***Browser version has some issues, download the desktop version for a stable experience***

[Current Status] Chapter 1/3
